name: Run Alpaca Run'
description:
The game consists of reaching the goal with as many treasures as possible.

We are a pirate who has docked on an island to loot it and has begun to be chased by the navy.

We carry with us the treasure we have stolen, but it weighs so much that it slows us down. They'll catch us if we go on like this! We need to get rid of part of the treasure in order to gain speed and get to our ship to escape.

Along the way we'll see wealthy nobles we can loot so we can bring even more treasure to our ship.
